DOC.brief_summary: Three month treatment acute VTE Fragmin pediatric cancer patient
DOC.brief_title: Fragmin Treatment Acute VTE Pediatric Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Primary study objective include determine pharmacodynamic ( PD ) profile treatment dos dalteparin pediatric subject different age cancer venous thromboembolism ( VTE ) , use anti-Xa ( Xa ) level population PD analysis methodology , determine median dose require achieve therapeutic anti- Xa level ( 0.5 1.0 International Units [ IU ] /mL ) base subject age weight .
